name: Customer adds multiple products with different quantities to the cart

methodName: Customer adds multiple products with different quantities to the cart

testSteps.description: Given that the customer is logged in

exception.message:
Expected: an element that is clickable
     but: no matching element found by [user menu icon located with: id: menuUser] was not clicked

children.description: When he selects one or more products
And he adds each product to the cart with different quantities
Then the cart should reflect the selected products with the correct quantities

userStory.narrative: The customer wants to add products with different quantities to the cart.
